context: Regulation of driving speeds on an expressway with varying lane specifications

MTL_expressions.description: Driving speeds for different vehicle lanes of an expressway are indicated

propositions.description: Driving speeds are indicated in different vehicle lanes on an expressway
asscumptions: Speed limit indicators are present in all lanes
Drivers have visible access to these indicators

propositions.description: Maximum speed limit is globally defined as 120km/hr
assumptions: The speed limit does not change over time or with varying conditions

propositions.description: Minimum speed limit is globally defined as 60km/hr
assumptions: The speed limit does not change over time or with varying conditions

propositions.description: Minimum speed limit for left lane when there are two lanes is 100km/hr
assumptions: Specific direction of lanes is not specified
ambiguities: Assumed we are considering the scenario from the driver’s perspective

propositions.description: Minimum speed limit for farthest left lane when there are three or more lanes is 110km/hr
assumptions: Case for exactly three lanes is considered
ambiguities: What if there are more than 3 lanes?

propositions.description: Minimum speed limit for middle lane when there are three or more lanes is 90km/hr
assumptions: Case for exactly three lanes is considered
ambiguities: What if there are more than 3 lanes?

MTL_expressions.description: Discrepancies in speed limit signs and stated regulations

propositions.description: Discrepancy between speed limit sign and stated regulation is resolved in favour of the speed limit sign
assumptions: The speed limit sign is correct and overrides any other regulations
ambiguities: Conditions or criteria for discrepancy are not mentioned

dependency_sequence.dependency_description: Once speeds are indicated, global speed limits apply
Lane-specific speed limits are defined after global limits
Discrepancies between speed limits and indicated speeds are resolved last

non_formalized_parts.description: Where there is any discrepancy between the speed indicated by a speed limit sign put up on a road and the driving speeds mentioned above...
non_formalized_parts.reason_for_non_formalization: Not all terms in this sub clause have been completely formalized
